changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.createView: SELECT n.id, p.name AS parent, rel.name AS relationship, c.name AS child, n.inference, n.premise1, n.premise2, n.notes, u.name AS updated_by, n.version FROM location_network n JOIN location p ON n.parent = p.id JOIN relationship rel ON n.relationship = rel.id JOIN location c ON n.child = c.id JOIN agency u ON n.updated_by = u.id;
